::Killfest/Greven::

Killfest watches the two energon cubes are loaded. He looks at 
Motormaster, remembering something.

"One of my bots is out on a mission above the planet. If he returns 
while in the Ark, he'll aid us."

He pauses to listen to a report from Greven over the internal 
communication system.

"Greven and Demise have gotten a shuttle from Darkfate. They'll be 
right behind us."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Meanwhile, Greven hears the order that Darkfate gives Wespah.

"No, don't go to his coordinates yet," he says over the comm to 
Darkfate, "We need to be on that shuttle to provide troops support. If 
you have other available troops, send them in shuttles as well."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Flying towards the base, Astroblast notices Dead-End and 
> Speedbreaker. Before they have time to respond, he makes a 
> quick landing beside the two, and says, "Get several cubes in here 
> now! We are in a hurry." He opens up his hatch.
> ______________________________
> 
> Dead-End immediately grabs two of the cubes that have not been 
> loaded up, and puts them into the open hatch, "Slag some bots 
> while your gone eh?"
> ______________________________
> 
> "Yah," replies Astroblast as he closes his hatch rising steadily 
> upward to th
